List of skill gems

From Path of Exile Wiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

List of skill gems.

For a list of support gems, please read List of support gems

Note that green in color gem (aka Dex gem) must requires Dex and red in color gem (aka Str gem) must requires Str and blue in color gem (aka Int gem) must requires Int, so that the table below exclude some columns to avoid redundancy. The table below show additional Attributes requirement of the gem, but a green gem that requires Dex and Str, DOES NOT counted as a Str gem.

Contents

  • 1 List
  • 2 See also

List

A list of skill gems is displayed below.
